item.title: DDS Spec
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch™, post:2, topic:162644”]This is what i got on this server, i didn’t add specs though…

public boolean DDS2Damg = false;
public int DDStimer = 0;

public void DDSSpecial() { if(IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 2) { staticAnimation(252, absX, absY, 100); setAnimation(0x426); actionTimer = 4; SpecDamgNPC(45); DDS2Damg = true; DDStimer = 1; AnimationReset = true; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; SpecDamgNPC(25); SpecialDelay -= 2; } else if(IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 2 && (PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].inwildy || PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].inwildy2) || (duelStatus == 3)) { int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX; int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY; int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; SpecDamg(35); DDS2Damg = true; DDStimer = 1; staticAnimation(252, absX, absY, 100); startAnimation(0x426); actionTimer = 4; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; SpecialDelay -= 2; } else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 2 && !DDS) DDS = true; else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 2 && DDS) DDS = false; else { sendMessage("You dont have enough power."); } getFilling(); }

public boolean DDS = false;

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && !DDS) sendQuest("S P E C I A L A T T A C K", 7586); else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && DDS) sendQuest("@yel@S P E C I A L A T T A C K", 7586);

Under Process:

if((IsAttacking || IsAttackingNPC) && DDS) { DDSSpecial(); DDS = false; }

case 29138:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698) { DDSSpecial(); } else { sendMessage("You need to have a special weapon equipped To use a special attack"); }

case 48023:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698) { DDSSpecial(); } else { sendMessage("You need to have a special weapon equipped To use a special attack"); }

I’m sorry but i didn’t add this to my server, its the the worst peice of shit i’ve ever seen. Same ints are declared with different cases, god.

I’m not sure which part makes it hit twice, check the method, i haven’t reviewed it yet, have to make it into a handler.[/quote]

Dont work bud
w/e at least you tried and not like those other fags that dont post shit like DUHPK LIKE HE SHOULD BE POSTING RIGHT NOW!!!

Read full topic

item.title: DDS Spec
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

This is what i got on this server, i didn’t add specs though…

public boolean DDS2Damg = false;
public int DDStimer = 0;

public void DDSSpecial() { if(IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 2) { staticAnimation(252, absX, absY, 100); setAnimation(0x426); actionTimer = 4; SpecDamgNPC(45); DDS2Damg = true; DDStimer = 1; AnimationReset = true; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; SpecDamgNPC(25); SpecialDelay -= 2; } else if(IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 2 && (PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].inwildy || PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].inwildy2) || (duelStatus == 3)) { int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX; int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY; int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; SpecDamg(35); DDS2Damg = true; DDStimer = 1; staticAnimation(252, absX, absY, 100); startAnimation(0x426); actionTimer = 4; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; SpecialDelay -= 2; } else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 2 && !DDS) DDS = true; else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 2 && DDS) DDS = false; else { sendMessage("You dont have enough power."); } getFilling(); }

public boolean DDS = false;

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && !DDS) sendQuest("S P E C I A L A T T A C K", 7586); else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && DDS) sendQuest("@yel@S P E C I A L A T T A C K", 7586);

Under Process:

if((IsAttacking || IsAttackingNPC) && DDS) { DDSSpecial(); DDS = false; }

case 29138:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698) { DDSSpecial(); } else { sendMessage("You need to have a special weapon equipped To use a special attack"); }

case 48023:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698) { DDSSpecial(); } else { sendMessage("You need to have a special weapon equipped To use a special attack"); }

I’m sorry but i didn’t add this to my server, its the the worst peice of shit i’ve ever seen. Same ints are declared with different cases, god.

I’m not sure which part makes it hit twice, check the method, i haven’t reviewed it yet, have to make it into a handler.
